p: The coulombic efficiency of poly-[NiAmben] calculated as the ratio of cathodic and anodic voltammetric charges Q red/Q ox ( Table S1) is close to unity at higher scan rates, which indicates high chemical reversibility of redox transformations in the poly-[NiAmben] film. As the scan rate decreases, so does the Q red/Q ox ratio but the value of Q red remains virtually independent of v s .
